## Results

## Descriptive statistics table

::: {.cell-output-display}

|:------------------------|:------------|

|FA -CH2CH2COO-           |33.6 (7.8)   |

|Lipid CH3- 2             |168.2 (29.2) |

## Running multiple models

::: {.cell-output-display}

|PUFA                     |  3.2688029| 5.602082e-01|  2.1142565| 0.0344934|
|Lipid -CH2-              |  0.0025921| 3.138898e+00| -1.8972514| 0.0577948|
|MUFA+PUFA                |  0.4555963| 4.487599e-01| -1.7518235| 0.0798042|
